Title: Relates to the imposition of sales and compensating use taxes in the county of Putnam
Summary: Extends provisions of law relating to the imposition of sales and compensating use taxes in the county of Putnam from November 30, 2020 until November 30, 2022.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the imposition of sales and compensating use taxes in the county of Putnam
